column5: In Soviet Russia, you don't run over bear!!! Bear runs over you!!!!

It never ceases to amaze me how low some people will stoop. Too bad the bear didn't free himself as that guy was hoofing it's back, and took out its frustration on the guy instead of the tire. I hope there was a lot of vodka involved, not sure how else to comprehend this??
Wonder if road hazard insurance covers the punctures lol
Question is: Who went out to change the flat tire?
Question is: Who went out to change the flat tire?  I would just drive on the flat until I hit Hungary and then i would pull out the spare!!

man just backup let the bear free and move on with your night.  Leaving it there pinned was a stupid thing to do.  laughing while it was pinned was just awful.  Wish it would have ripped out all four of the tires on both vehicles.
